name: MarkTeQ
overview:
MarkTeQ offers you IT Solutions, Mechatronics & Marketing solutions at one place.

MarkTeQ is a joint venture of young, enthusiastic yet down to earth techno savvy engineers who have come together to fill the gap that exists in the IT field. They are fully equipped and totally dedicated to provide a trident of solutions for you in the fields of IT, Mechatronics, and Marketing. This excellent trio caters to the needs of diverse fields of industries and business.

We are committed for providing high-quality products and excellent after sales service.

SERVICES: WEB DEVELOPMENT SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT MOBILE APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT DESIGNING SOLUTIONS WEB HOSTING SOLUTIONS SEO (SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION) E-MARKETING (BULK SMS & EMAILS) PRODUCT MARKETING DIGITAL MEDIA MARKETING MECHATRONICS MOTION SOLUTIONS INDUSTRIAL TRAINING

PRODUCTS: PAYROLL & HR MANAGEMENT SYSTEM INVENTORY & SALES MANAGEMENT SYSTEM ONLINE EXAMINATION SYSTEM SCHOOL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM REAL ESTATE BROKER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND MANY MORE…..
